title: Ral kap anga kalin
lyrics:
Ral kap anga kalin,
Pathian mite u;
In hmaa Lal Isua
Enin kal rawh u.
Kan Lal Kristan hmelma
Bei turin min hruai,
Hma lam pan chung zelin,
A puanzar en r'u.

Ral kap anga kalin,
Pathian mite u,
In hmaa Lal Isua
Enin kal rawh u.

Isua hming kan lamin,
Ramhuaiho an tlan;
Kristian sipaite u,
I hneh zel ang u,
Pathian kan fak hunin,
Hremhmun a nghing ang;
Unaute u, auvin
Hla sa ring rawh u.

Sipai rual lian tak ang,
Kohhhranho an awm;
Mi thianghlimte hniakhung,
Tunah kan zui mek.
Ram tinah kan awm na,
Pumkhat kan ni a;
Kan rin, kan beisei, kan
Hmangaih a in ang.

Lallukhum leh thutphah
A boral thei e,
Hnam lal thei mah sela,
An tlawm thei bawk e.
Nimahsela, Krista
Kohhranho an lal,
Pathian thu avangin
Ramhuaiho an tlawm.

Khawvel mi zawng zawngin,
Min zawm ve rawh u;
Hnehna hla chu sain
Min aupui rawh u.
Ropuina leh fakna,
Kan Lalber hnenah,
Chawimawina hla sain,
Lei leh van zai se.
